message:
When a specific appreciation appears twice (or more) -- like the MC and OS having the same Problem element -- it is usually expressed uniquely in each throughline.

Is the same true for the Unique Ability? That different expressions of the Element appear in each throughline?
I'm confused about this - Unique Abilities are Variations, not Elements. Do you have an example for this or more clarity?
@MikeDerk Yes, because the context is different.
